content.rendered:
Radiology Tech | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full time Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
  • Position is in a pain management clinic
  • Candidate will work with diagnostic x-rays as well as a C-Arm
  • Will travel between Bartlesville and Muskogee offices
  • Must have a current ARRT license in good standing
  • Must have at least 1 year radiology experience
  • $16+/hour, depending experience
